trustedCircle.title: Your Trusted Circle
trustedCircle.subtitle: Designate reliable individuals to assist your family
trustedCircle.description: Build a network of trusted people who can step in during emergencies and help your family navigate difficult times.
trustedCircle.empty: Your trusted circle awaits its first member. We recommend starting with your most reliable family member or friend.

form.fullNameHelper: Use their complete name as it appears on official documents
form.relationshipPlaceholder: e.g., Spouse, Adult Child, Sibling, Close Friend
form.selectRoles: Choose their roles in your family's plan
form.capabilitiesHelper: What makes them suitable for these responsibilities?
form.limitationsHelper: Any factors that might affect their ability to help
form.instructionsHelper: Include any specific guidance for their role
form.backupHelper: Who they should replace if that person cannot serve
form.accessDescription: What information they can access and when

descriptions.emergency: Can access critical information only during family emergencies
descriptions.limited: Can view basic contact information and emergency instructions
descriptions.standard: Can access most family information and important documents
descriptions.full: Can view and manage all family information and assets
descriptions.executor: Complete access to all information with management capabilities

guardianship.title: Guardianship Arrangements
guardianship.subtitle: Ensure proper care for your dependents
guardianship.description: Designate trusted individuals to care for minor children or dependents who cannot care for themselves.
guardianship.noChildren: No minor children or dependents have been added to your plan.

communication.title: Family Communication Plan
communication.subtitle: How your trusted circle will coordinate
communication.description: Establish clear communication protocols for your trusted circle during emergencies.

notifications.personRemoved: {{name}} has been removed from your trusted circle
notifications.reviewScheduled: Review meeting has been scheduled with {{name}}
